description: Convolution of Thue-Morse sequence A001285 with itself.
comments: Comment from Jeremy Gardiner, Dec 28 2008: The following sequences all appear to have the same parity: A003071, A029886, A061297, A092524, A093431, A102393, A104258, A122248, A128975.
links: Tanya Khovanova, There are no coincidences, arXiv preprint 1410.2193, 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
